title: ENSAM: an efficient foundation model for interactive segmentation of 3D medical images
details: E Stenhede, AM Bjørnstad, A Ranjbar - CVPR 2025: Foundation Models for 3D Biomedical …
abstract: We present ENSAM (Equivariant, Normalized, Segment Any-thing Model), a lightweight and promptable model for universal medical image segmentation in 3D. Designed for interactive use and constrained computational settings, ENSAM is …
